title: Do You Have a Hidden Agenda
itunes:title: Do You Have a Hidden Agenda
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to not only discuss the chaos that happened over the weekend, but to have our white listeners call in to explain why they are protesting and if it is for a different agenda. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Mayor Deblasio for supporting cops driving into a crowd and later on it was only right to have Attorney Cory Smith call in to help us out with our mental health.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
